Subject: information access centre 12 not giving any value after login
Description: information access centre 12 not giving any value after login
What_We_Know__c:
----------------------
02.05.2025 
Artem Naskal 

Had a meeting with customer. 
We checked the logs for AIC - saw that they user account we were logging in with had a "Request Access" role. 
But there were no errors related to SQL connection. 

As such, tried logging in with built-in admin( login:admin pass:sb). 
admin was not logged in before so we got prompted to set admin password. 

After logging in with built-in admin customer confirmed that AIC is working. 

Customer asked to send a couple of articles to him: how to set up user roles and how to secure aic. 

How to set up user roles:
https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/AIC_12.0/page/Content/Access/InformationCenter/Admin/Configuration/Overview.htm
https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/AIC_12.0/page/Content/Access/InformationCenter/Admin/Configuration/ConsoleAccess.htm

What different user roles provide:
https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/AIC_12.0/page/Content/Access/InformationCenter/Admin/UserLanding.htm

How to secure AIC:
https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/AIC_12.0/page/Content/Access/InformationCenter/Installation/Secure.htm

Customer confirmed that ticket can be closed.
Solution_Comment__c:
We checked the logs for AIC - saw that the user account we were logging in with had a "Request Access" role.
But there were no errors related to SQL connection.

As such, we tried logging in with built-in admin.
Built-in admin was not logged in before so we got prompted to set admin password anew.

After logging in with built-in admin we confirmed that AIC is working.

As was discussed, I am sending you additional materials from our helpcenter that will guide you on how to configure different roles for users and how to secure access to AIC using SSL:

These articles will walk you through on how to configure users with different roles:
This is an overview of the Console Configuration
https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/AIC_12.0/page/Content/Access/InformationCenter/Admin/Configuration/Overview.htm
And this article provides an overview of Console Access (user roles) configuration
https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/AIC_12.0/page/Content/Access/InformationCenter/Admin/Configuration/ConsoleAccess.htm

This article gives an overview of how different user roles change user`s landing page in AIC:
https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/AIC_12.0/page/Content/Access/InformationCenter/Admin/UserLanding.htm

And this article has a detailed step-by-step guide on how to secure access to AIC with SSL (certificate needs to be pre-installed in to Local Machine > Personal store):
https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/AIC_12.0/page/Content/Access/InformationCenter/Installation/Secure.htm
